LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: A rewritten ecosystem――

LABEL: 0x2C8
STRING: This place was no longer the sea we knew.

LABEL: 0x308
STRING: It was now closer to Gehenna and tolerated the presence of deformed monsters.

LABEL: 0x346
STRING: How difficult would it be to escape from here?

LABEL: 0x428
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa went down to the power room to try and restore power to the ship.

LABEL: 0x46C
STRING: I headed back to the lobby alone.

LABEL: 0x498
STRING: Touri and Reiri, who had been waiting there for a long time, were there,

LABEL: 0x4D0
STRING: as well as Hiragino, who had gone to the emergency room to check on Hikari.

LABEL: 0x520
STRING: Wouldn't Reiri take advantage of this chaos to do something...?

LABEL: 0x55E
STRING: I couldn't say that I didn't have my doubts.

LABEL: 0x58C
STRING: However, she was still staring blankly into space, sitting in the same position as before.

LABEL: 0x645
STRING: 「Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x706
STRING: Don't "Ah?" me...

LABEL: 0x73E
STRING: Reiri's mouth was left wide open.

LABEL: 0x76C
STRING: I wasn't entirely sure if she was fully conscious or not.

LABEL: 0x7A2
STRING: Even during breakfast earlier, no matter what was done to her, she had sat there without moving a muscle...

LABEL: 0x7EE
STRING: Actually, who was this?

LABEL: 0x812
STRING: To think that Reiri, who seemed to devote almost all her energy to not showing any weakness to others,

LABEL: 0x866
STRING: would display such an empty-headed appearance...

LABEL: 0x8A6
STRING: 「Is she okay, Touri?」

LABEL: 0x93E
STRING: 「Ah... Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x9B9
STRING: 「She seemed pretty tired yesterday, so I think that's all it is.」

LABEL: 0xA14
STRING: 「Is she not a morning person?」

LABEL: 0xAB2
STRING: 「I mean, Reiri doesn't usually sleep much.」

LABEL: 0xAF0
STRING: 「So when she does go to bed sometimes, she can't seem to wake up properly...」

LABEL: 0xB3F
STRING: Reiri had been bedridden for ages after we had discovered her, come to think of it.

LABEL: 0xB89
STRING: She'd slept through most of the day afterward...

LABEL: 0xBBD
STRING: Hadn't she been sleeping as much or even more than Hikari, now that I thought about it?

LABEL: 0xCDC
STRING: 「Isn't that a health issue?」

LABEL: 0xD12
STRING: 「It might be an autonomic nervous system disorder...」

LABEL: 0xD57
STRING: 「Still, wouldn't that interfere with her daily life?」

LABEL: 0xE0B
STRING: 「Yeah... I don't know if I should say this, but...」

LABEL: 0xE4B
STRING: 「Reiri doesn't really go to school.」

LABEL: 0xE89
STRING: 「Also, you're half right that she might be sick.」

LABEL: 0xEBB
STRING: 「She's always staying up due to the medicine she takes.」

LABEL: 0xF50
STRING: 「I think she took some earlier, so maybe she'll wake up soon?」

LABEL: 0x1010
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x1031
STRING: Hiragino made a sour face.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: The drug that Reiri was taking―if what Hiragino said earlier was true, it was some kind of stimulant.

LABEL: 0x10B3
STRING: Taking something like that on a regular basis was not normal by any stretch of the imagination.

LABEL: 0x1107
STRING: I was sure the burden on her body was considerable.

LABEL: 0x1139
STRING: Her body looked immature for her age.

LABEL: 0x116D
STRING: Her limbs were thin like an old man's, her eyelids were thin,

LABEL: 0x1191
STRING: and her voice hoarse.

LABEL: 0x11B3
STRING: By all means, she looked like a drug addict.

LABEL: 0x126D
STRING: 「Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x1285
STRING: 「How long has she been relying on drugs like that?」

LABEL: 0x12E4
STRING: 「Let's see...」

LABEL: 0x1313
STRING: 「――Does being a doctor make one want to uncover people's personal information like that?」

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: I turned around at her low voice.

LABEL: 0x13C4
STRING: Reiri was there, completely back to her usual self.

LABEL: 0x14DB
STRING: 「Ah! Good morning, Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x150C
STRING: 「Nee-san... I told you not to talk about me without my knowledge.」

LABEL: 0x15DA
STRING: 「Sorry. I thought Hiragino-san and Katagiri-san would be fine.」

LABEL: 0x1629
STRING: 「Well... I guess it's all right.」

LABEL: 0x1652
STRING: Reiri stretched.

LABEL: 0x1670
STRING: She looked completely awake and surveyed the area with a wry smile.

LABEL: 0x1783
STRING: 「A blackout, huh...?」

LABEL: 0x17A4
STRING: 「Yep. Yukari-san and Tokiwa are working on restoring power.」

LABEL: 0x199F
STRING: Faintly.

LABEL: 0x19B9
STRING: The lights turned back on gradually and quietly.

LABEL: 0x19E9
STRING: Did the two of them manage to do something about it?

LABEL: 0x1AA9
STRING: 「Impressive.」

LABEL: 0x1AC8
STRING: Reiri muttered to herself.

LABEL: 0x1AE8
STRING: I couldn't tell what she was feeling from her expression alone.

LABEL: 0x1B80
STRING: 「We did it, Reiri! Maybe this will get us closer to escape!」

LABEL: 0x1C28
STRING: 「Pretty sure it's just plus-minus zero at this point...」

LABEL: 0x1C5A
STRING: Reiri went along with the smiling Touri.

LABEL: 0x1C92
STRING: She had a somewhat annoyed expression on her face, but despite that, she was dealing with Touri firmly.

LABEL: 0x1CEE
STRING: Touri, too, kept talking with a smile on her face, as if she knew Reiri wouldn't mind listening to her.

LABEL: 0x1D50
STRING: So this was the daily life of the Nomura sisters...

LABEL: 0x1D7E
STRING: As I was suddenly witnessing the peaceful everyday life of the sisters, I hesitated to ask anything tactless.

LABEL: 0x1E12
STRING: Eventually, Yukari and Tokiwa returned.

LABEL: 0x1F0D
STRING: 「It was all thanks to Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x1F99
STRING: 「Yes, as expected of me.」

LABEL: 0x1FCF
STRING: Apparently, Tokiwa had reconnected the wiring in the power room with her bare hands.

LABEL: 0x2009
STRING: She said that she couldn't understand the wiring at a glance, which sounded extremely dangerous no matter how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0x2059
STRING: She might be aware of the risks and dangers in her own way,

LABEL: 0x209D
STRING: but if she decided that something was safe based on her own standards that others couldn't understand,

LABEL: 0x20E1
STRING: she would tackle the problem head-on, which in turn made her look reckless.

LABEL: 0x2167
STRING: That was seriously dangerous...

LABEL: 0x218F
STRING: But thanks to her, we managed to avoid danger for the time being... or so I thought.

LABEL: 0x21E5
STRING: Next to the proud-looking Tokiwa was Yukari, looking downcast.

LABEL: 0x2297
STRING: 「...What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x2341
STRING: 「I'm sorry, but I have some bad news.」

LABEL: 0x237F
STRING: 「There's no point in hiding it.」

LABEL: 0x23AD
STRING: 「The battery for the heating is almost out.」

LABEL: 0x23E4
STRING: The heating...?

LABEL: 0x23FE
STRING: Yukari nodded with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x2431
STRING: 「This ship is kept warm by generating heat in the steam room in the basement,

LABEL: 0x246B
STRING: and circulating that steam through tubes in the ceiling.」

LABEL: 0x24C7
STRING: 「The power source for it is also independent of the entire <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x251B
STRING: 「But since it's summer, do we even need heating...?」

LABEL: 0x2550
STRING: Touri didn't seem to get it.

LABEL: 0x2576
STRING: Yukari shook her head from side to side weakly.

LABEL: 0x266B
STRING: 「This is the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x268D
STRING: 「There's no summer or winter here――」

LABEL: 0x26B7
STRING: 「At the bottom of the sea, where even sunlight can't reach, the temperature is always constant.」

LABEL: 0x26F9
STRING: 「You may not have noticed, but the heating is still on, right?」

LABEL: 0x274F
STRING: 「Ever since we left the surface, it's maintained a comfortable room temperature inside the ship...」

LABEL: 0x27FF
STRING: 「Then, if the heating turns off now...」

LABEL: 0x2840
STRING: 「It won't be long before we freeze to death.」

LABEL: 0x28EC
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x290D
STRING: Touri fell silent.

LABEL: 0x293F
STRING: 「Can't we repair it like we did with the power just now...?」

LABEL: 0x2998
STRING: 「That's impossible... It's too dangerous. You understand that, right?」

LABEL: 0x29DF
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x2A87
STRING: It went without saying.

LABEL: 0x2AAF
STRING: The repairs done in the power room were already quite dangerous,

LABEL: 0x2AEF
STRING: and if the same thing was to be done in the steam room, which controlled the heating,

LABEL: 0x2B2D
STRING: the pipes which the heated steam flowed through had to also be taken care of.

LABEL: 0x2B6F
STRING: If it came to that, there was the possibility of an explosion involving the entire <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x2BC6
STRING: With heating still on for now, it was unrealistic to take such a risk.

LABEL: 0x2D25
STRING: 「Of course, it's not like we'll be in a crisis as soon as the heating turns off.」

LABEL: 0x2D79
STRING: 「We should last about a day, at the very least.」

LABEL: 0x2E11
STRING: 「But, we have to be aware that the heating won't last for long...」

LABEL: 0x2E70
STRING: It wasn't simply because of this morning's declaration――

LABEL: 0x2E96
STRING: Something had to be done today.

LABEL: 0x2EDA
STRING: We had to escape from here――

LABEL: 0x2F6E
STRING: 「What's wrong, Katagiri-san? You look troubled.」

LABEL: 0x2FAB
STRING: 「...How can we convey our situation to the surface?」

LABEL: 0x2FE9
STRING: 「There has to be a way... Something...」

LABEL: 0x3034
STRING: 「Ah, yes!」

LABEL: 0x3071
STRING: At some point, Touri had cheered up and raised her hand.

LABEL: 0x3115
STRING: 「What about a messenger bottle?」

LABEL: 0x313F
STRING: 「We'll put a message in a bottle and float it upward! That way, our message will reach the surface, right?」

LABEL: 0x31FE
STRING: 「That's right! If we use those bottles we drank the day before――」

LABEL: 0x32D2
STRING: ...Don't tell me you're planning on using Dividing Dry...!

LABEL: 0x331C
STRING: That space-bending drink.

LABEL: 0x333C
STRING: That... thing should not be returned to the surface.

LABEL: 0x3374
STRING: It was a cultural distortion that had been created by the excessive development of human civilization.

LABEL: 0x33C0
STRING: Just thinking about it made me feel strange saliva inside my mouth...

LABEL: 0x3402
STRING: That thing!

LABEL: 0x341E
STRING: It was better left buried in the depths of the sea...!

LABEL: 0x346F
STRING: 「...That would be difficult in many ways.」

LABEL: 0x3548
STRING: While I was clenching my fists in turmoil, Yukari denied her calmly.

LABEL: 0x35A9
STRING: 「In many ways? Like what?」

LABEL: 0x363B
STRING: 「First of all, a plastic bottle won't be able to withstand this deep-sea water pressure.」

LABEL: 0x36E6
STRING: 「It would be so flattened that it would be impossible to get a message out.」

LABEL: 0x37AA
STRING: 「Given the potential for damage, it's doubtful that paper or a memory stick alone can deliver the information safely.」

LABEL: 0x3890
STRING: 「Even if we manage to get a bottle all the way to the surface, who'll find it floating in the middle of the sea?」

LABEL: 0x3986
STRING: 「It's impossible...」

LABEL: 0x39A5
STRING: ...You didn't have to gang up on her like that.

LABEL: 0x3A13
STRING: Well, they were both right, but...

LABEL: 0x3B16
STRING: 「It's not a bad idea, however.」

LABEL: 0x3BAE
STRING: 「It's not?」

LABEL: 0x3BD5
STRING: 「The idea of "physically delivering a message."」

LABEL: 0x3C11
STRING: 「We need to think carefully about how to do it, but I think it's the right direction.」

LABEL: 0x3C68
STRING: He didn't sound all that confident.

LABEL: 0x3C9E
STRING: Hiragino implored Yukari as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x3D5D
STRING: 「Yes... Hiragino-sensei is right.」

LABEL: 0x3D89
STRING: 「If the communication functions cannot be restored, then a more physical method is one way to go.」

LABEL: 0x3DEB
STRING: 「Our means of communication aren't limited to sound waves and electromagnetic waves...」

LABEL: 0x3E34
STRING: 「Do we have anything of the sort on hand?」

LABEL: 0x3ED8
STRING: 「As far as I know, there is no――」

LABEL: 0x3F17
STRING: 「How could there not be?」

LABEL: 0x3F9F
STRING: It was Reiri who interjected.

LABEL: 0x3FC3
STRING: She grinned as she looked down on Yukari.

LABEL: 0x40C6
STRING: 「How could ROMLES not have a buoy on their deep-sea submarine?」

LABEL: 0x4122
STRING: 「I don't mind admiration for science and technology, but would they be foolish enough to devalue more anachronistic methods?」

LABEL: 0x4199
STRING: 「You're right... There should be some.」

LABEL: 0x41D5
STRING: 「If we go to the warehouse, there should be a messenger buoy.」

LABEL: 0x422E
STRING: 「That's a comrade of a message bottle, right?」

LABEL: 0x426B
STRING: Touri was in high spirits.

LABEL: 0x429E
STRING: 「They were originally used on submarines.」

LABEL: 0x42DA
STRING: 「They'd send buoys with cables attached to them to the surface to serve as a guide for the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x432E
STRING: 「And using that cable, they would be able to locate and rescue the submarine――」

LABEL: 0x43E4
STRING: 「It's a classic and anachronistic method, though.」

LABEL: 0x4412
STRING: 「We're a good ways into the 21st century, and yet we still have smoke bombs in passenger cars, don't we?」

LABEL: 0x4468
STRING: 「It's highly likely that messenger buoys, or something similar, are also loaded on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x44E4
STRING: 「If there are any, they're in the warehouse, right?」

LABEL: 0x454B
STRING: Touri was ready to go right away.

LABEL: 0x456F
STRING: She was rotating her arms in a circular motion and stretching her legs.

LABEL: 0x4611
STRING: 「Okay, let's go――」

LABEL: 0x4642
STRING: 「Touri-nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x46C0
STRING: As she was raising her fists in the air, Reiri called out to her.

LABEL: 0x46F6
STRING: In an instant, Touri lowered her arms, bent her knees, and crouched down in front of Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4815
STRING: 「What's wrong, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x4848
STRING: 「Won't you stay by my side?」

LABEL: 0x4885
STRING: ...What?

LABEL: 0x489B
STRING: Her voice was as thin as ever, but her tone was uncharacteristically coaxing.

LABEL: 0x48E3
STRING: She called out to her sweetly, and Touri, who was fired up a moment ago, was instantly caged.

LABEL: 0x49DA
STRING: 「You can leave the search to the others.」

LABEL: 0x4A0C
STRING: 「I want you to stay by my side.」

LABEL: 0x4AAE
STRING: 「Reiri...!!」

LABEL: 0x4B29
STRING: 「Okay, got it!」

LABEL: 0x4B50
STRING: ...That was a little too much, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x4B86
STRING: Maybe it's because this was Reiri, but was she really that easily swayed?

LABEL: 0x4C18
STRING: Without noticing our stunned reaction, Touri quickly decided to stay.

LABEL: 0x4CE6
STRING: 「Um... Well then, I'll go.」

LABEL: 0x4D20
STRING: 「Sorry, but could someone else come with me――」

LABEL: 0x4D67
STRING: 「I'll go. And Tokiwa, too.」

LABEL: 0x4D99
STRING: 「There's no problem with that, right?」

LABEL: 0x4E20
STRING: Yukari stared blankly at my immediate reply.

LABEL: 0x4E50
STRING: She was frozen with her mouth half open.

LABEL: 0x4E82
STRING: 「Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x4F08
STRING: 「Huh? ...Ah, yes.」

LABEL: 0x4FF7
STRING: 「I'm sorry, but I'd prefer to stay close to the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x5039
STRING: 「If that allocation is fine with you, it'll be better for me as well.」

LABEL: 0x50DF
STRING: 「Yes. There's no problem...」

LABEL: 0x5114
STRING: Yukari nodded quickly in agreement, but I felt like she wasn't fully convinced.

LABEL: 0x5164
STRING: She slapped both of her cheeks, psyching herself up.

LABEL: 0x51EB
STRING: 「Now then... Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x54CD
STRING: Front section, warehouse.

LABEL: 0x54EB
STRING: The impact of the accident had left the various items inside scattered around.

LABEL: 0x5533
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa made their way into the warehouse like they were used to it.

LABEL: 0x556F
STRING: Come to think of it, these two were the ones who came here to get food every time we ate.

LABEL: 0x55BE
STRING: I followed behind them as they shuffled through the cardboard boxes, undeterred.

LABEL: 0x560B
STRING: What we were looking for was a messenger buoy.

LABEL: 0x5635
STRING: If there was one, it had to be the sort of vivid color that would stand out after being launched into the sea, but...

LABEL: 0x568B
STRING: 「I can't find one.」

LABEL: 0x5719
STRING: 「Let's see... Is there anything resembling the shape...?」

LABEL: 0x5760
STRING: 「Ohoho!」

LABEL: 0x5799
STRING: Tokiwa shouted.

LABEL: 0x57BD
STRING: Actually, what was with that shout?

LABEL: 0x57E5
STRING: She wasn't a rich lady character as far as I knew, or rather, I didn't think even rich ladies would make that kind of noise.

LABEL: 0x5849
STRING: Tokiwa happily raised her arms in the air following her unusual shout.

LABEL: 0x594E
STRING: 「There it is! Here!」

LABEL: 0x5982
STRING: She was holding something in both hands.

LABEL: 0x59AC
STRING: And, there was something in her mouth.

LABEL: 0x59F0
STRING: A familiar-looking plastic bottle.

LABEL: 0x5A20
STRING: I could see the catchphrase "Space Bending" on the label.

LABEL: 0x5A8A
STRING: 「...Well, let's continue the search.」

LABEL: 0x5AAE
STRING: Good grief. I lowered my gaze to the sea of cardboard boxes on the floor again.

LABEL: 0x5BA9
STRING: 「Hey! Hey, hey!」

LABEL: 0x5C3B
STRING: 「Take a look, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x5C6A
STRING: Why did she nominate me?

LABEL: 0x5C88
STRING: Unable to ignore her, I obeyed her beckoning reluctantly.

LABEL: 0x5CDC
STRING: And what I saw was――

LABEL: 0x5D99
STRING: It was a mountain of Dividing Dry.

LABEL: 0x5DD1
STRING: What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0x5DEF
STRING: Why were there so many of them?

LABEL: 0x5E21
STRING: Since proper food had been carried out of the warehouse, the sad division that had been left behind made it stand out even more.

LABEL: 0x5E8D
STRING: Hmm... Dividing.

LABEL: 0x5FB8
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san. Your hands have stopped moving!」

LABEL: 0x5FF2
STRING: 「Stop slacking off and search.」

LABEL: 0x602B
STRING: 「Huh? Oh...」

LABEL: 0x604B
STRING: While I was overwhelmed by the Dividing meadow spreading before me, Tokiwa had already returned to her search.

LABEL: 0x60B5
STRING: What the hell...? I was the only one looking like an idiot here...

LABEL: 0x611A
STRING: 「Ohoho!」

LABEL: 0x6139
STRING: The same shout was heard again.

LABEL: 0x615B
STRING: Did she find it this time?

LABEL: 0x6190
STRING: 「Here it iiiss!」

LABEL: 0x621E
STRING: 「Whoa?!」

LABEL: 0x62A6
STRING: I looked back toward Tokiwa and was met with round eyes.

LABEL: 0x62E4
STRING: A headpiece was attached to the brightly-colored kimono she was wearing.

LABEL: 0x632C
STRING: A brightly smiling face.

LABEL: 0x6360
STRING: Round eyes that didn't blink.

LABEL: 0x6386
STRING: A stuffed animal.

LABEL: 0x63AE
STRING: It was... the head of a macaroni penguin.

LABEL: 0x63F5
STRING: 「It's even cuter than cute ol' me.」

LABEL: 0x6440
STRING: What was she on about now?

LABEL: 0x646E
STRING: Was she seriously searching or not...?

LABEL: 0x6538
STRING: Why was the <SHEEP III> loaded with a macaroni penguin costume in the first place?

LABEL: 0x6593
STRING: Seriously, what was ROMLES thinking?

LABEL: 0x65C9
STRING: This mascot wasn't cute to begin with... Why were they pushing it so hard...?

LABEL: 0x6695
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san. Your hands stopped again.」

LABEL: 0x672C
STRING: 「Get a hold of yourself...」

LABEL: 0x675B
STRING: Why was I the only one getting scolded...?

LABEL: 0x6785
STRING: Yukari sighed, crossed her arms, and sank into thought.

LABEL: 0x6825
STRING: 「Still, there's no sign of it.」

LABEL: 0x6858
STRING: 「I guess that means the buoys weren't loaded after all.」

LABEL: 0x68A3
STRING: 「Or maybe they're stored in the rear section warehouse.」

LABEL: 0x69AE
STRING: 「I see. Let's go, then.」

LABEL: 0x6A63
STRING: Yukari hesitated.

LABEL: 0x6A7D
STRING: Memories of yesterday came flooding back to me.

LABEL: 0x6A9B
STRING: 「...<COOS> is over there.」

LABEL: 0x6AC9
STRING: 「If we screw up and get attacked, it'll all be for nothing.」

LABEL: 0x6B75
STRING: 「I see. You're right.」

LABEL: 0x6B97
STRING: 「Although, well, they may all be gone by now.」

LABEL: 0x6BE1
STRING: 「Anyway, let's go take a look. Right away.」

LABEL: 0x6C54
STRING: Tokiwa wandered out with an air of mystery accompanying her.

LABEL: 0x6C9C
STRING: Before I knew it, the macaroni penguin costume had been tossed aside.

LABEL: 0x6CEE
STRING: Tokiwa walked away without a care in the world, like a child who was completely tired of her toys.

LABEL: 0x6D50
STRING: The severed head of the macaroni penguin lay at my feet.

LABEL: 0x6D84
STRING: That creepy smile... It looked sad now for some reason.

LABEL: 0x6E57
STRING: 「Heh heh‾」

LABEL: 0x6E76
STRING: We accompanied Tokiwa, who was in high spirits, to the bridge.

LABEL: 0x6EC0
STRING: We opened the watertight door and peered inside.

LABEL: 0x6F8C
STRING: There was a thin layer of moisture on the floor, but it was already pretty dry.

LABEL: 0x6FD2
STRING: It was clean as far as I could see, and I couldn't see anything else inside.

LABEL: 0x702C
STRING: Tokiwa, however, stood still in a daze.

LABEL: 0x7074
STRING: What was it now?

LABEL: 0x709E
STRING: 「...There's nothing here.」

LABEL: 0x70D7
STRING: 「Yes. Now's our chance to go to the rear――」

LABEL: 0x711C
STRING: 「No... We can't.」

LABEL: 0x713E
STRING: 「Don't move, please!」

LABEL: 0x7167
STRING: Tokiwa shouted.

LABEL: 0x7181
STRING: Her desperate voice made me shudder involuntarily.

LABEL: 0x720E
STRING: Just then――

LABEL: 0x7226
STRING: I felt something move.

LABEL: 0x72EC
STRING: 「What is that...?」

LABEL: 0x730A
STRING: Was it just my imagination?

LABEL: 0x732A
STRING: I hurriedly rubbed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x734A
STRING: A dim, hazy trail, as if something was moving, stretched from the bulkhead to the floor.

LABEL: 0x73AB
STRING: 「That light...」

LABEL: 0x73CE
STRING: The moment I heard her murmur...

LABEL: 0x745F
STRING: The streaks of light that stretched across the entire floor glowed in unison.

LABEL: 0x7493
STRING: A writhing light―a color that burned into my eyes and wouldn't disappear.

LABEL: 0x74CB
STRING: It was truly indescribable, cosmic light――

LABEL: 0x7576
STRING: We all turned back and closed the bulkhead on the front section side.

LABEL: 0x75C2
STRING: No words were needed.

LABEL: 0x75EA
STRING: <COOS> was still there.

LABEL: 0x7612
STRING: We couldn't get any closer.

LABEL: 0x7636
STRING: No one could suggest the crazy idea of going to the rear section anymore.

LABEL: 0x77ED
STRING: 「...Let's reconsider for a moment.」

LABEL: 0x7817
STRING: 「I don't think we should...」

LABEL: 0x7852
STRING: 「Right. Let's go back to the others for now.」

LABEL: 0x78F6
STRING: 「Oh, before that, can we stop by the laboratory?」

LABEL: 0x79A2
STRING: 「...? Sure, that's fine.」

LABEL: 0x79DD
STRING: 「Yaay!」

LABEL: 0x7A14
STRING: Tokiwa dashed off as soon as she said that.

LABEL: 0x7A40
STRING: However, with her slow legs, it was only about as fast as a brisk walk.

LABEL: 0x7A92
STRING: Even though she went ahead and had no key with her, she was the same as always.

LABEL: 0x7AFE
STRING: In a way, I was grateful that she hadn't changed even after seeing <COOS> and not being overwhelmed by its hopeless colors.

LABEL: 0x7B68
STRING: I started walking after her with those thoughts in mind.

LABEL: 0x7E39
STRING: 「Jellyfish-chan...!」

LABEL: 0x7E5D
STRING: 「I missed you!」

LABEL: 0x7E82
STRING: After opening the door to the laboratory, Tokiwa jumped to the tank without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x7ECA
STRING: Don't tell me we came all this way just for that guy?

LABEL: 0x7F70
STRING: 「Yes, that's right.」

LABEL: 0x7F95
STRING: Her answer was immediate.

LABEL: 0x7FB7
STRING: I was hesitant to say anything when she said it so plainly and clearly.

LABEL: 0x8015
STRING: She'd said it was in order to collect seawater, but in the end, she simply liked jellyfish, didn't she?

LABEL: 0x8087
STRING: Tokiwa gazed at the jellyfish with an enraptured expression while clinging to the water tank.

LABEL: 0x80D1
STRING: His fingertips caressed the pressure-resistant glass.

LABEL: 0x8111
STRING: What the hell was she doing...?

LABEL: 0x813B
STRING: I looked away from her in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x8163
STRING: Yukari being Yukari, she was sizing up the shelves on the walls without sparing a single glance for Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x81B5
STRING: 「Are you looking for something?」

LABEL: 0x824D
STRING: 「We couldn't find the cure for <Alice> yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x8297
STRING: 「According to Hiragino-sensei, it wasn't in the emergency room, so if there is one, it should be in here...」

LABEL: 0x82F4
STRING: She surveyed the room.

LABEL: 0x8390
STRING: 「If there's no cure here――」

LABEL: 0x83C6
STRING: 「Since we can't rule out the possibility that some of us could already be infected,

LABEL: 0x8412
STRING: we have to get to the surface before the onset of the symptoms.」

LABEL: 0x8451
STRING: The heating situation,

LABEL: 0x8471
STRING: the onset of <Alice>,

LABEL: 0x8491
STRING: and our multiple time limits made Yukari's tone impatient.

LABEL: 0x84FC
STRING: 「Jellyfish-chan...」

LABEL: 0x8523
STRING: Tokiwa was in no hurry as she stared at the tank in ecstasy.

LABEL: 0x8575
STRING: ...What the hell was this girl doing?

LABEL: 0x85A1
STRING: How long was she going to keep this up?

LABEL: 0x85CF
STRING: It looked like she was having fun if nothing else...

LABEL: 0x8603
STRING: 「Are you done?」

LABEL: 0x868D
STRING: 「Not yet.」

LABEL: 0x86AC
STRING: Once again, her answer was immediate.

LABEL: 0x86C8
STRING: What did she mean, "not yet?"

LABEL: 0x86F2
STRING: What would make her happy?

LABEL: 0x8718
STRING: When was she going to stop?

LABEL: 0x8748
STRING: 「Hey, Tokiwa. What's so great about that thing anyway?」

LABEL: 0x87F0
STRING: 「Excuse me?」

LABEL: 0x8808
STRING: 「Let's see, if I had to say...」

LABEL: 0x88AD
STRING: 「Its face?」

LABEL: 0x88C8
STRING: What...?

LABEL: 0x88DC
STRING: That was the worst possible answer.

LABEL: 0x8904
STRING: Did jellyfish even have faces?

LABEL: 0x8934
STRING: 「There's got to be something else...」

LABEL: 0x89C8
STRING: 「Ehhh...」

LABEL: 0x8A3F
STRING: 「Its form, texture, and most importantly, its color!」

LABEL: 0x8A86
STRING: 「The color...? Isn't it transparent?」

LABEL: 0x8B14
STRING: 「What?! It's plenty colorful!」

LABEL: 0x8B72
STRING: ...Colorful, you say?

LABEL: 0x8B96
STRING: Tokiwa had been sensing the presence of <COOS> way before we had even noticed it so far.

LABEL: 0x8BE8
STRING: Could it be――

LABEL: 0x8CD1
STRING: 「That jellyfish must be infected with <COOS> as well.」

LABEL: 0x8D18
STRING: Yukari seemed to have realized something, too.

LABEL: 0x8D46
STRING: Her eyes that made the transparent jellyfish look colorful.

LABEL: 0x8D7A
STRING: Eyes that could see <COOS> before it emitted light.

LABEL: 0x8DB0
STRING: What could she see...?

LABEL: 0x8DE7
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x8E1E
STRING: 「Don't wanna.」

LABEL: 0x8EA2
STRING: 「I said  l e t ' s  g o.」

LABEL: 0x8F32
STRING: 「D o n ' t  w a n n a.」

LABEL: 0x9010
STRING: 「...I'm going to get angry.」

LABEL: 0x909E
STRING: 「...I guess there's no helping it.」

LABEL: 0x90C2
STRING: 「I, being the adult that I am, will reluctantly go with you.」

LABEL: 0x913B
STRING: And just as she declared, Tokiwa reluctantly stood up while pouting.

LABEL: 0x918F
STRING: Her pouty face didn't look very adult-like, but I didn't think she realized it herself...

LABEL: 0x925F
STRING: Yukari held up her keycard to the laboratory door and locked it.

LABEL: 0x929B
STRING: 「...Hey, how do you know that <COOS> is there?」

LABEL: 0x934B
STRING: 「By the differing colors.」

LABEL: 0x9380
STRING: 「The colors, huh...」

LABEL: 0x939C
STRING: I didn't know what to make of that.

LABEL: 0x93E0
STRING: It wasn't just me, but Yukari and Hiragino, too... Only Tokiwa could tell this difference in colors.

LABEL: 0x9438
STRING: 「So... what kind of color is it?」

LABEL: 0x94D0
STRING: 「Colorful.」

LABEL: 0x9543
STRING: 「Fluffy and puffy.」

LABEL: 0x95F4
STRING: 「You need to do a better job of explaining.」

LABEL: 0x9620
STRING: Tokiwa tried to explain using gestures,

LABEL: 0x9662
STRING: but those couldn't really convey color that well.

LABEL: 0x9704
STRING: 「Hmm... I don't really know what to tell you...」

LABEL: 0x97C5
STRING: 「...Ah, right.」

LABEL: 0x97E3
STRING: 「It's similar to that color.」

LABEL: 0x980C
STRING: Tokiwa pointed somewhere as she said it.

LABEL: 0x983C
STRING: Beyond her finger was Yukari's chest.

LABEL: 0x9862
STRING: She was holding her blue key card in front of it.

LABEL: 0x98A1
STRING: 「This, you say?」

LABEL: 0x98C6
STRING: 「...So, it's blue?」

LABEL: 0x994E
STRING: 「No, I mean colorful and fluffy.」

LABEL: 0x998B
STRING: 「...I don't get it.」

LABEL: 0x99A9
STRING: It was like a narrative trick.

LABEL: 0x99CB
STRING: Or, a language game.

LABEL: 0x9A31
STRING: Yukari was thinking.

LABEL: 0x9A4B
STRING: She then nodded, apparently convinced of something.

LABEL: 0x9AE9
STRING: 「Maybe that's what it means...」

LABEL: 0x9B1C
STRING: 「...Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x9BA6
STRING: 「Well, now that we're done here, let's return to the others.」
